Good afternoon ðŸ™‚
Next week we will be stopping by your job sites with ribbons for Breast Cancer Awareness Month. If you know someone who is or has suffered from breast cancer and would like to sign their name on a ribbon, let us know. We will have these posted in our office in honor of them for the entire month of October. Feel free to give us a call if you have any questions.

Nous afficherons ces rubans dans nos bureaux en leur honneur pendant tout le mois d'octobre. N'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  nous appeler en cas de questions.
